    static final List<GridDirection>
    GridDirection.EIGHT_DIRECTIONS
    The eight cardinal and intercardinal directions: NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, WEST, NORTHWEST, NORTHEAST, SOUTHWEST, SOUTHEAST.
    static final List<GridDirection>
    GridDirection.FOUR_DIRECTIONS
    The four cardinal directions: NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, WEST.
    static final List<GridDirection>
    GridDirection.NINE_DIRECTIONS
    The eight cardinal and intercardinal directions (EIGHT_DIRECTIONS), plus CENTER.
